title: Crimson Heart (item)
summaries: The Crimson Heart is a light pet-summoning item that summons a fast-moving bleeding Crimson Heart that emits dim, red light. It follows the player around while affected by gravity, rolling or hopping along the ground. If it falls far behind the player, it will fly through blocks to catch up. The Crimson Heart has a 1/5 (20%) chance of dropping from destroyed Crimson Hearts, but it also has a 1/5 (20%) chance of being acquired from Crimson Crates(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) and Hematic Crates(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions), which are obtained by fishing in the Crimson.
<linked>The Corruption</linked> counterpart to the Crimson Heart is the <linked>Shadow Orb</linked>.
